conversation: Mayor

Ladies and gentlemen, let me give you the monthly fishing report. John caught 21 tons of fish. Kate caught 19 tons of fish. Jack caught 17 tons of fish. Emma caught 17 tons of fish. Luke caught 26 tons of fish.
John

Wow, great catch everyone! I'm a bit surprised by how much Luke caught, but I guess he really knows his stuff. I was aiming for 40 tons, but I only got 21. I'm hoping to up my game next month. Does anyone have any tips or strategies to share?
